text: The Righteous Brothers were an American pop group consisting of two men named Bill Medley and Bobby Hatfield. They formed in California in 1962. Some of their hits include "You've Lost That Lovin' Feelin'" and "Unchained Melody". Phil Spector produced those songs. == Albums == * Right Now (1963) * Some Blue-Eyed Soul (1964) * This is New (1965) * You've Lost That Lovin' Feelin' (1965) * Just Once in My Lifeâ€¦ (1965) * Back to Back (1965) * Soul & Inspiration (1966) * Go Ahead an Cry (1966) * Sayin' Somethin' (1967) * Souled Out (1967) * One for the Road (1968) * Re-Birth (1969) * Give it to the People (1974) * Sons of Mrs Righteous (1975) * The Righteous Brothers (2016) ==Notes== Category:American pop music groups Category:Soul bands Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: The Righteous Brothers
